column4: Microsoft wins landmark appeal over seizure of foreign emails
column5: NEW YORK A federal appeals court on Thursday said the U.S. government cannot force Microsoft Corp  and other companies to turn over customer emails stored on servers outside the United States.

column4: BRIEF-LinkedIn does not plan to host Q2 conf call due to pending merger
column5: * Due to pending merger with Microsoft  LinkedIn does not plan to host a conference call for its Q2 business results

column4: UPDATE 4-Microsoft wins landmark appeal over seizure of foreign emails
column5: NEW YORK  July 14 A federal appeals court on Thursday said the U.S. government cannot force Microsoft Corp  and other companies to turn over customer emails stored on servers outside the United States.

column4: Microsoft wins U.S. appeal over warrant for emails held abroad
column5: NEW YORK  July 14 Microsoft Corp won the reversal on Thursday of a court order requiring it to turn over to the U.S. government the contents of a customer's email account stored on an Irish server  in a victory for privacy advocates.

column4: Tesla asked to brief U.S. Senate panel on fatal Florida crash
column5: WASHINGTON The chairman of the U.S. Senate committee that oversees auto safety issues wrote Tesla Motors Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk on Thursday  asking the automaker to brief the committee on a fatal May 7 crash involving its Autopilot software.

column4: Reuters Business News Schedule at 1230 GMT/0830 AM ET
No more Tesla buyback guarantee as company cuts price of Model X
column5: SAN FRANCISCO/DETROIT Tesla Motors Inc has ended a program that guaranteed the resale value of its cars  and lowered the starting price of its Model X crossover  the high-profile electric vehicle maker said on Wednesday.
